course_title_2025: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD): Myths, Media and Meaning
best_gem_comment: TAKE THIS COURSE!!! If you have any interest in psychology at all, I highly recommend it. It's a gem for sure, the debates are engaging, and the field trip are really great. Dr. Arnett is so sweet and such a genuine person.
best_gem_comment_short: It's a gem for sure, the debates are engaging, and the field trip are really great.
